data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Al-Qadisiyah.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al-Qadisiyah, Iraq
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Al-Qadisiyah prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 488 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Al-Qadisiyah.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Al-Qadisiyah, Iraq not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Arab, North Iraqi people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, we pray that the state of Al-Qadisiyah be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Al-Qadisiyah, Iraq.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Al-Qadisiyah, Iraq to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
